channel.title: Idk what is wrong with my code can someone help me?
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc450/xray51/Idktheprob.png[/img]
Im trying to make it so when you click the food it makes you pay 5000gp for 25 manta rays and if you don't have 5000gp it tells you. You need 5000gp. And won't let them click the button an still get food without paying 5000. Delta source. Havn't coded in awhile forgot a little on if and else statements.

item.title: Idk what is wrong with my code can someone help me?

item.description:
@ohokay wrote:
